thread.title: Report: Riza Aziz contests DOJ seizures, claims innocence
thread.title_full: Report: Riza Aziz contests DOJ seizures, claims innocence

title: Report: Riza Aziz contests DOJ seizures, claims innocence
text:
More 
Prime Minister Najib Razak's stepson Riza Aziz has filed a contest against the US government's attempt to seize real estate properties allegedly bought from funds embezzled from 1MDB. 
The Hollywood Reporter reported that in the filing last week, Riza claimed he is an "innocent owner" of the said assets. 
Riza's lawyer Matthew Schwartz, in demanding a dismissal of the US Department of Justice's (DOJ) civil forfeiture suits, said the US government had failed to include "essential details" about the supposed crimes.
